original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 819: Session, It’s all Abot the Metadata
original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett talks Session and cryptocurrency skepticism with Kee Jefferys! Why fork Signal? How does Session manage to decentralize? And why the cryptocurrency angle? Listen to find out!


https://getsession.org/
https://github.com/oxen-io/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: - セッションと暗号通貨懐疑論の探求
body: 今週、ジョナサン・ベネットがSessionと暗号通貨の懐疑について語ります。
titles: - セッションと暗号通貨懐疑論の探求
- セッションの分散化の管理方法
- 暗号通貨の視点が重要な理由
- FLOSS Weeklyポッドキャストの最新エピソードを見逃すな！
